titleStmt.title: Samuel Gowen and Donald Webster v. JH McGraw. Orginial Wit of Commitment.

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Samuel Gowen and Donald Webster v JH McGraw. Original Wit of Commitment.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: In said County and Territory on the 15th day of January 1883, Committed at the time and place aforesaid; and whereas the said Samuel Gowen and Donald Webster have failed to give bail in the sum of two hundred dollars each for their appearance to juror at the ninth term of the district court, as required by me, therein in the name of the United States you are commanded to recieve the said Samuel Gowen and Donald Webster into your custody in the said jail and they there safely keep until hereby discharged by due service of cause
div1.ab: Given under my hand this 17th day of January 1883
Justice of the Peace Mount Vernon in and for Whatcom Co Wash Tery
Office of the Sheriff of King County, W.T. | ss.
div1.p: I hereby certify the foregoing to be a true and correct copy of the wit of commitment in the case of the Territory of Washington vs Samuel Gowen and Donald Webster.
